properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for signing JWT tokens. Should be a strong, random string.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 86400000 (24 hours).

properties.name: jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds. Default is 7 days (604800000ms).

properties.name: jwt.max-refresh-tokens-per-user
properties.description: Maximum number of active refresh tokens allowed per user. Older tokens are revoked when limit is exceeded.

properties.name: file.upload.directory
properties.description: Directory path where uploaded files will be stored.
